wakes.yacl_missing: Yet Another Config Lib is not in your mods folder
wakes.yacl_missing.message: If you want to edit the configs you need YACL V3. Do you want to install it?
wakes.config.title: Wakes config
wakes.config.option.use_9_point_stencil: Use 9 point stencil for laplace operator
wakes.config.description.wave_propagatio: The impact a pixels has on its neighboring pixels inside the wakes
wakes.config.description.wave_decay_fact: Specifies how much of a pixels value is left after each tick. (Logarithmic scale)
wakes.config.description.initial_wave_st: The strength a source starts with to produce a wake.
wakes.config.description.splash_plane.ca: The velocity at which the maximum size of the splash plane is reached
wakes.config.description.effect_spawning:
Specifies which effect(s) a source (player, mob, etc) can produce. 

Simulation refers to the simulated waves on the water that acts as wakes. 

Planes refers to the splashes that shoot out on either side.
wakes.config.description.wake_resolution: The pixel resolution of the wakes. Good for adjusting the wakes to better visually fit some resource packs.
wakes.config.description.blending_functi: Subtle: Muted, darker color. Opacity can be changed. Great if you don't want too much.

Vibrant: Colors stand out more. Opacity can't be changed. 

*Vibrant style is automatically applied when using fabulous graphic settings

Custom: Create your own style by specifying the source and destination factors in the debug tab. 
(Reopen config screen to see)
wakes.config.description.use_water_blend: Should the wake's colors blend with the water's colors?
wakes.config.description.use_9_point_ste: Old debug option. Can look good with 'subtle' wake style.
